response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it represents a significant investment in quality and craftsmanship. Considering its intrinsic worth and the potential it holds, I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $15,000. This price reflects the true value of the item and includes all associated costs and benefits. I believe that this offer presents an exceptional opportunity for both of us to achieve our goals. Should you decide to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
